alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:50PM EDT until June 06 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fayette County in central Ohio... Northeastern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Pickaway County in central Ohio... Southeastern Clark County in west central Ohio... Southeastern Greene County in west central Ohio... Southern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 149 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sabina, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Sabina, Jamestown, Mount Sterling, Jeffersonville, Bloomingburg, South Solon, Midway, Bowersville, Milledgeville, Octa, Newport, Chenoweth, Interstate 71 at State Route 38, Derby, Rosemoor, Bloomington, Madison Mills, Bookwalter and Shady Grove. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 58 and 88. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Pickaway
